website_summaries.verdict: An extremely versatile dip belt that can also be used as a sled harness or weightlifting belt.
pros: This dip belt is 100% nylon, making it durable, lightweight, and breathable
The belt features reinforced stitching and black steel hooks and carabiners for quick connection and impressive holding strength
cons: Although the belt is durable, the friction caused by the sliding weights on the nylon strap can make it fail prematurely

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my inversion table
customer_reviews.text: Having a bad back I have tried to use my inversion table to help. Unfortunately, it hurts my ankles and knees too much. Using this dip belt and a yoga strap, I was able to use this as an inversion belt and it works great. :) I just took a yoga strap and wrapped in around the foot pad at the right height. Then I took the strap that was included with this belt and put it through the yoga strap. I leave my feet in the normal place in case something bad would happen I could catch myself with my feet. Inversion belts are 200, this much cheaper and I and my back our happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hooked On Concrete

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed... so about the strap
customer_reviews.text: The belt is good I use it for dips, sled pulls and other things. I don't think people that complain about the strap get that... 1. Of course it's going to fray if you use it with weights that constantly move. 2. If this had a chain with it, it would be more. When I bought this Inalready had straps and chains. Yeah it is a bit short. I adapted. It has pulled some good weight though. 400-600lbs But again, it wasn't constantly rubbing on heavy weights. When I got this I was looking for a good affordable way to pull a sled without the feeling of the front of my body being caved in.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrRick

customer_reviews.title: It's only been a few weeks of using this belt three times per week and I can feel my legs getting stronger and my mobility is progressing nicely. Would definitely recommend to anyone with weak legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Started using this product for belt squats to strengthen my quads after realizing arthritis in my knee and ankle. What a difference! It's only been a few weeks of using this belt three times per week and I can feel my legs getting stronger and my mobility is progressing nicely. Would definitely recommend to anyone with weak legs (for squatting purposes) where isolating the quadriceps is a priority.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty belt
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction for the belt. I can see the weight bearing strap not lasting long but I am OK with that as I will get a link chain later on to replace it. Perhaps, it something they should think about in the future. Unless they're trying to keep prices down for components and shipping costs down due to weight. Careful with sizes. The small is a lot smaller than they describe. I returned the small one because it stated that it was for 31" waist and it turned out to be too small. The medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William B Rivera

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and the customer service is even better. I bought this belt through Amazon and they failed to include the strap. Amazon was no help as they just wanted me to return it claiming the strap was no longer available. I contacted Iron Bull and they got the strap sent out to me right away. The belt fits well and is very robust. I love the flexibility - I use it for squats and weighted dips. I only wish I could give Iron Bull more stars for their service.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Nice all-in-one belt.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks before reviewing this belt. So far, so good. As a pull-up and dip belt, it works fine. I have used well over 100 pounds on dips and it handles it with no problem. It also works fine as a regular weight belt. I only use a weight belt for heavier compound lifts, and I find that this belt provides sufficient support. It's nice to only need one belt.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt, Terrible Strap
customer_reviews.text: As other have said, the belt is definitely well built and works well. I'm 5'8" 168, and I ordered the small. I should have ordered the medium but I think Once I'm back to 160 the small will be perfect but a medium would probably work fine as well. The strap though is pure garbage. Go to Home Depot and buy a length of chain to use for a couple bucks and you'll have a great setup. This thing would be 5 stars if they sent it with a heavier strap or chain.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Using for decompression
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my hips instead of my ankles or knees while inverting on my adjustable decline situp bench. You don't need an inversion table and the smaller angle of a situp bench is quite enough to get a lumbar stretch. I cut the back ring off and only use the 2 side rings. The strap is perfectly sized to loop over the handle on the bench so it holds me up at the right distance.
customer_reviews.author: E. Szumlas

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT with INVERSION TABLE.
customer_reviews.text: I hated my inversion table because of the pressure the grips put on my feet/ankles. This belt allows you to add cables or tiedowns so that your waist can take some of that weight. I only need to stretch my low back, not my frigging ankles, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Power Sports Promotion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all-in-one belt!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't talk my wife into separate items, as well as my gym bag is nearing full capacity. The belt holds up to 135 lbs (61.3kg), which for me gives me quite a bit of room to go up. It also provides sufficient compression on my lower back for dead lifts. If your a competitive or advanced lifter, this may not stand up. For beginners or people who lift light for muscle tone, this will work well.
customer_reviews.author: girlie4zuz

customer_reviews.title: great versatile belt
customer_reviews.text: great belt. IT IS VERSATILE AND CAN BE USED TO CHANGE YOUR WORKOUT ROUTINES. used to use a chain dip belt but made my already heavy gym bag heavier. after getting this, no chain to scratch up my other gym equipment and lightens my bag. will refer this belt to all my fellow gym bros
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very well made, sturdy and fairly comfortable. I actually purchased this belt to use on my inversion table and on an inline back stretch bench (on floor). I haven't quite worked out the optimum way to harness myself while wearing the belt during stretching, but not because of any problem with the belt. The belt arrived quickly, is quite sturdy and will probably give me many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt and reasonable pricing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and appears to be well made. Used it the first time today for weighted chin ups and couldn't tell I had it on (except for less reps from the extra weight strapped on) much better design than the old dip/pull up belts since this one will work for squats and deadlifts too. I like multi-function. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Nukitsuke

customer_reviews.title: Great for belt squats on my landmine barbell setup
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month or two and it has worked out great. There are three metal loops I can loop the chain through to hook up to my landmine barbell so it fits well. Granted, I don't use heavy weight, but the weight I use is perfect and I get a great leg workout without the back strain.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A

customer_reviews.title: Beset dip/pullup belt ive used
customer_reviews.text: I've had chain dip belts for years and after losing my latest one I purchased this. Extremely happy with this so far almost 2 months in. The strap is long enough that ive fit 4 45lb plates in it with room for more. theres 3 loops to configure how/where you want the weight to hang from. I have mine on the sides of the belt and it is much more comfortable and easing on your back than older chain link belts
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Frigo

customer_reviews.title: Great product have had zero issues but the strap for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product have had zero issues but the strap for holding extra weight seems a little weak. Not comfortable putting more than a 45lbs plate on it and am still careful but works very well and seems it will last me a few years
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I use this belt for weighted chins/dips and it works very well. The belt it self feels very comfortable and strong, like it can last for years and years. The strap it self that holds the weights seems sturdy and durable enough, although I have seen other reviews say that it has frayed and broken. But in that case you can easily replace it with some strong chain and be good to go
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, gives great support for squats and other Olympic movements. Dip belt works great for me no problems with the strap. Amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Kippie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality-built to last
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality-built to last, and very confortable. The design of this Belt is such as that you can put almost any weight and you are sure that this belt would not fall from your waist plus the weight is not that close that it won't hurt your private sex organs. The large velcro strap make it as tight as you want to. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to pull heavy items
customer_reviews.text: My husband pulls a large heavy tire without hurting his back. The belt distributes the weight evenly. The clip holds the tire well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Also usable as a light weight belt. I put on a 45 plate and another small plate no problem and it sits kind of in your lap. Better for me than longer chains that cause the plate to swing around.
customer_reviews.author: too much information

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for dips, works great. I'll probably change the strap for a chain eventually, but the strap does work for now. I haven't used it for anything else, that's why I didn't give it a higher rating, because I just don't know how it will be for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Stubs

customer_reviews.title: This really is the most versatile belt!
customer_reviews.text: The quality feels good and the dip belt doubles as a lifting belt. Can also be used for sled pulls and many other exercises. This might be the best belt I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. Excellent quality and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is the best purchase I have made on gym gear in a long long time. I wouldn't go back to using a half belt with chain to save my life. Buy it, it's the same cost and is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this dip belt I use it for my clients as a metabolic conditioning specialist and I also use it for myself in order to squat on my bioforce home gym seeing as how I have cerebral palsy it does the trick to give me the exact stability I need while being able to perform the movement!
customer_reviews.author: rory koonce jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Dip Belt.
customer_reviews.text: So far all seems well. Built solid. Pretty comfy. 40 pounds with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and they love it. Very good quality and works as it should. Shipping was fast and product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad belt, but for a belt that seems designed ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad belt, but for a belt that seems designed for weighted triceps dips and weighted pull ups, it's not average at best. Was fine until I started going above 45lbs, feels like the belt is going to come off because of too much weight. It doesn't, but it just feels like it's slipping. Worried if it will hold up as I continue to increase the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality weight belt. fit is good, arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Belt is built well with robust hardware. The system of attaching weights is much better than chain. The customer support is fantastic. My belt didn’t include a strap. I emailed Iron Bull and had one sent out in 2 days. Very responsive. I have several Iron Bull products... all top quality and well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: My best new toy.
customer_reviews.text: This belt is great. Very sturdy build and just what I was looking for to use for belt squats, dips and other movements. I love the three different loops that give multiple options for each lift. I highly recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.author: David Zavadil

customer_reviews.title: Great support, strap needs cushion
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product but didn’t give it full stars because of the comfort of the strap, that thing digs into your inner thigh. I suggest adding padding.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... is the first dip belt I've bought and I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the first dip belt I've bought and I'm happy with the purchase. The positioning of the clips on the belt are not too close in and don't pinch the groin area, and it works great for dips and pull ups. I'm happy with the product and I'd recommend it for others looking for an affordable dip belt.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Microutsicos

customer_reviews.title: I was curious if the strap would be long enough to accommodate 45-pound plates comfortably. What I discovered is that you can tu
customer_reviews.text: Functions equally well for support during squats or deadlifts and for hanging weights from during dips. I was curious if the strap would be long enough to accommodate 45-pound plates comfortably. What I discovered is that you can turn the belt so that two of the loops are on the front. The material is sturdy and comfortable. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Just some guy

customer_reviews.title: Best belt I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best belt I have ever owned. It's great to do weighted pull ups and sled drags or just wear as a weight belt. It's made really rugged with metal d-rings.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This came in earlier than was expected. For the price, i was surprise for its high quality. The product is solid, durable and well designed. I loved its multifunctionality as a dip belt and as a regular back belt which saved me from purchasing 2 items. Overall, im very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what I ordered !!!
customer_reviews.text: The belt works fine, Have only tested a 35 weight, but plan to add weight in the future !!!
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Best Belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is very well made. All the stitching is heavy duty, the Velcro is industrial strength and the ‘D’ rings thick and strong. It’s easy to put on, take off and hang weight from.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this belt. Great quality. Would definitely buy it again and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great I use it with kettlebells to do squats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy. Really like the black metal clips
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy. Really like the black metal clips. I'm not sure how well the paint will hold up, but we shall see. The nylon strap seems pretty durable and holds 90lbs easily enough. Only use it for dips and pull-ups, so I can't comment on any sled pulls or anything.
customer_reviews.author: samuel a almengor

customer_reviews.title: Great for pull ups, and dips. Width of the belt on your lower back is a bit small for heavy squats/dead lifts.
customer_reviews.text: Great for pull ups, and dips. Can support up to 135 pounds added to the belt. It says it serves as a lifting belt too. I find the width of the belt on your lower back to be a bit small and less supportive then I had hoped for heavy dead lifts and squats. That being said still a good deal. But if you intend to lift heavy, and use this bet to support that, buy elsewhere. If you plan to use this to ad wight to your pull ups and dips then its excellent!
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use the belt to do weighted pull-ups, dips and box squats. Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jose N. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Sturdy and versatile. When sizing the belt remember that you will be wearing trunks and a shirt so go a little large.
customer_reviews.author: John Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. I use it for weighted pull-ups and it's very comfortable. The quality is excellent, nothing feels loose or makes me doubt its ability to hold weight. The powder coating is an excellent touch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Miller

customer_reviews.title: Belt is good quality construction with very sturdy materials
customer_reviews.text: came well packaged. Belt is good quality construction with very sturdy materials. Good instructions about NOT ordering your pant size for the waist, but measuring at the belly button. Big difference. Belt fits perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lesia McQuade

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The material is sturdy, the Velcro belt is sturdy, and the hooks are sturdy with a nice matte black finish. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Hurney

customer_reviews.title: light, packs up well in the bag, and is EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I've had more people come up to me asking me where I got this belt than I could have imagined. It's a pure joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Collins

customer_reviews.title: The belt itself seems great.
customer_reviews.text: Came without the sling!!! When I opened the package it was just the belt. I shipped to a relative and collected the belt after the window for returns had closed. However I was not expecting any problems with a simple order as this. The belt itself seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Castagne

customer_reviews.title: Fits small slim frames very well, is very durable and made with good quality
customer_reviews.text: The belt fits very snug on my small slim frame which is key when putting a lot of weight on it. Plus the third back loop is huge for pull a weighted sled. It's really comfortable and sits right where you out it. The durability is great and the belt is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product but strap for weight missing?
customer_reviews.text: I recently received this belt and took it to the gym to use and realized that the strap to hold the weight had not come with the product itself. I do not know if this was an error on the sellers end or what but I hope that it will get cleared up soon so that I can put the belt to proper use. Seems very sturdy and fits me comfortably. I weigh 160 and am about 6ft tall and the medium works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Belt itself is great. The strap is weak. Mine started breaking over 100 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for working out and it’s super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, Amazing Velcro strap for that Unbeatable secure ...
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, Amazing Velcro strap for that Unbeatable secure fit! The sling is a bit short (and un-adjustable), but still manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy i purchased this belt instead of the typical ones without the velcro. Works excellent and very strong!
customer_reviews.author: Donavan Alika Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my belt. I have used it twice so far. My main use of it was the side rings for my resistance band workouts and The belt does exactly what I wanted it to do! I was afraid of the quality but so far I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, i've hung 2 plates off of the strap for chest dips and this thing is rock solid! excellent product and what I've come to expect from Iron Bull!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: This is the dip belt you need! Heavy duty/ ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the dip belt you need! Heavy duty/ versatile, works as back support as well. I have also clipped resistance bands to it for speed agility workouts as well as sandbags. The belt itself is 5 stars , but because I use alot of weight I find that a thin copper back brace underneath it is golden and exceeds my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. It is very well constructed and made with good material.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has the Velcro on the waist
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has the Velcro on the waist, unlike most weight belts. I'm a petite female and I was worried that it would be too big, but it can fit almost any mid section. I use this for pull-ups/chin-ups and it works great- holds 45 lb. plates, easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Very well made. I have already recommended it to other gals I workout with. I workout 5-6 days per week.
customer_reviews.author: Kminnesotashopper

customer_reviews.title: Great w/o belt!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this belt. Haven't used it for dips just yet but mainly use it for weighted pull-ups. It absolutely works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MikeBway

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This belt is actually being used in a hip belt squat machine, so far it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as I hoped it would. Wish I had found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: P Pittman

customer_reviews.title: but lightweight and comfortable weight belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, but lightweight and comfortable weight belt. Is primarily designed for dipping, but works well for back support as well. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it was better than expected, superb condition, would deal with again, highly recommended, shipping was extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Belt for two
customer_reviews.text: Definitely well constructed. Fits as shown and does the job. Even doubles as back support.
customer_reviews.author: Bloee S

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered within two days. Was suprised by how high quality the product is. Very durable and is obviously well made. The loops and clips are metal with no plastic so I expect it to last. The weight strap isn't too thick but I have had no problem holding a significant amount of weight. Overall, very satisfied and Iron Bull has a new fan
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sled pulls
customer_reviews.text: Using this to pull a weighted sled in my back yard. I’ve liked to so far. Very sturdy construction, but the material is supple enough not to dig into your hips. I’d recommend this belt
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought medium at first to small I'm a 36 waist. Got the large and couldn't be happier with this product. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has quality feel, but no quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased after Christmas, and just now opened to start a training program. The item looks used or defective with the edge binding either coming loose or sewn defectively. It's past the return deadline so I can't get a replacement. I'll update this to monitor the quality of the item, but I don't think this will last.
customer_reviews.author: A.Prime.Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Best weight belt for dip exercises!
customer_reviews.text: The belt fits tight and snug but it still feels comfortable. I have not had the belt very long but it seems like it will last because the quality of the belt is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dip Belt I Have Used!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different dip belts through the years...this is the best one yet! I purchased it for my home gym...it perfectly fits my needs...it is a good looking piece of equipment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Farmguy

customer_reviews.title: Broke at one week!
customer_reviews.text: Comments raved that it was such an awesome belt. After one week of using it...it broke with only a 25lb attached to it. Extremely disappointed stay away.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this belt. Durable construction. Comfortable, easy and fast on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri farm

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this consistently now for about 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this consistently now for about 2 months with up to 90lbs loaded on...no issues as of yet!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Spergel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! I use it for all sorts of leg work, as well. Attach it to a cable, and do all sorts of lunges, squats, and calf raises.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!  One of the better belts for weight pullups/dips.
customer_reviews.text: Love IT!. The nylon strap is strong enough for a 45lb plate. May upgrade the strap to chain if I go with multiple plates.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The clips that attach the loop to the belt aren't great (heavy, sharp, and not super easy to disconnect, which I do frequently during a workout), but simply replacing them w a couple climbing carabiners makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Josh O

customer_reviews.title: best deal out there
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, works better than the traditional ones, what else could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Very versatile. I like to use it with additional straps to pull tires and running drills.
customer_reviews.author: daniel wassell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this evening! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great innovative product.
customer_reviews.text: solid construction, use it for weighted movements as well as hooking on sleds. it has held up to 500# on the sled and 225 on the pullup/dip
customer_reviews.author: Sarav

customer_reviews.title: This belt is a great one. I am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: This belt is a great one. I am very satisfied with it. It has a high resistance and durability , great design. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: This dip belt is amazing. One of the best I've ever used. It's fits nice and snug and weight goes on easy and takes off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality belt. It is very comfortable and supportive while doing weighted pull ups and dips. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jvhn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves it! He has a tiny waist and it fits and is comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mciver

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for us
customer_reviews.text: Not able to wrap around waist without using the attachment to hold it in place disappointed and would like to return it
customer_reviews.author: 1up

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the belt with 25, 45, and 2x45 lb weight plates. It's very comfortable and the material is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro stitching was torn out less than two months
customer_reviews.text: Stitching of Velcro was torn out for the use less than two months.
customer_reviews.author: osamu fujioka

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hello Friend. the package arrived today, I'm very happy with my purchase. that is.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed, quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Gives great back support- best workout belt I've ever had and works very well for squats by avoiding axial loading to the spine. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship is outstanding and it is the perfect piece of equipment for performing donkey calf raises.
customer_reviews.author: Hamp-T

customer_reviews.title: Tough

product_meta.title: Iron Bull Strength Advanced Dip Belt - Dip Pullup Squat Multifunction Versatile Weight Belt for Lifting
product_meta.description:
The Most Versatile Weightlifting Belt on The Market

Our Dip Belt has been designed with one simple idea in mind. To be the best all-in-one multipurpose weight lifting belt on the market. We've simply eliminated all limitations of a standard dip belt and brought you a new lifting belt with countless different options and attachments points. Position the weight in front, at the back, hook the pulleys on the side, rig your sled behind! Dips, Squats, Pull Ups, Sled Training, Back Support... Name it, the Advanced Dip Belt does it. We only used the best, most durable material to manufacture this belt. Premium quality nylon, black steel hooks and carabiners and reinforced stitching all around is why this belt stands out from the others.

Who Can Benefit From Using a Dip Belt?

Current weighted belts are uncomfortable and limit how and where you can hook up weights..

Main Features:

-4" Wide Premium Nylon Belt and Sling with Black Steel Hooks and Carabiners

-Nylon Interior for Maximum Grip, Comfort, and Temperature Control.

-Reinforced Stitching

-3 Heavy Duty Steel Anchors

Fit Guide

Measure with your clothing around the area the belt will be worn (NOT pants waist size). Pull tape tight for best measurement. 

-Small: 28-32"
-Medium: 32-36"
-Large: 36-40"
-X-Large: 40-44"
-XX-Large: 44-48"

5 Star Experience

Built tough for your workouts, our next generation dip belt is durable, offers extreme support, effective and fully portable, will last many years of usage and give you the results you want. We’re so confident that you’ll absolutely love our weighted belt that if somehow you aren’t 100% satisfied, just contact us and we’ll take them back for a full refund!

Click on the Yellow "Add to Cart" button above Now to MAXIMIZE your workouts and experience the RESULTS you deserve.
feature_bullets: ✅ MAXIMUM VERSATILITY: Dip Belt, Pull Up Belt, Squat Belt, Sled Harness, Weight Lifting Belt... Name it, our advanced dip belt does it! We designed the advanced dip belt with 3 different anchors used for countless different attachments and exercises.

✅ PREMIUM QUALITY: The advanced dip belt is made of 100% nylon, the strongest, lightest, flexible material for a multipurpose lifting belt. Nylon is the perfect material for maximum grip, comfort and temperature control while training with heavy weights.

✅ HIGH DURABILITY: We designed this belt with one simple idea in mind: It has to support a ton of weights without giving up. The advanced dip belt has reinforced stitching all around, on the belt and on the sling, heavy-duty nylon threads, black steel hooks and carabiners for maximum strength and durability.
✅ SIZE: Please use sizing char in listing images to order the correct size. DO NOT ORDER PANTS SIZE!
✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We're confident you'll absolutely love our multipurpose belt. If somehow you aren't 100% satisfied, just contact us!
